schemaXmlContent:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE schema SYSTEM "solrres://tisrepository/dtd/solrschema.dtd">
<schema name="search4dfireOrderInfo" version="1.5">
  <types>
    <fieldType name="string" class="solr.StrField" sortMissingLast="true" omitNorms="true" omitTermFreqAndPositions="true" />
    <fieldType name="double" class="solr.TrieDoubleField" precisionStep="0" positionIncrementGap="0" />
    <fieldType name="float" class="solr.TrieFloatField" precisionStep="0" positionIncrementGap="0" />
    <fieldType name="tfloat" class="solr.TrieFloatField" precisionStep="8" positionIncrementGap="0" />
    <fieldType name="int" class="solr.TrieIntField" precisionStep="0" positionIncrementGap="0" />
    <fieldType name="tint" class="solr.TrieIntField" precisionStep="8" positionIncrementGap="0" />
    <fieldType name="long" class="solr.TrieLongField" precisionStep="0" positionIncrementGap="0" />
    <fieldType name="tlong" class="solr.TrieLongField" precisionStep="8" positionIncrementGap="0" />
    <fieldType name="dynamicStr" class="com.qlangtech.tis.solrextend.fieldtype.DynamicStrField" />
    <fieldType name="dynamicFloat" class="com.qlangtech.tis.solrextend.fieldtype.DynamicFloatField" />
    <fieldType name="allmenu" valIndex="0" class="com.qlangtech.tis.solrextend.handler.component.AllMenuFieldType" />
    <fieldType name="allkind" valIndex="2" class="com.qlangtech.tis.solrextend.handler.component.AllMenuFieldType" />
    <!--
  <fieldType name="date" class="com.dfire.tis.solrextend.fieldtype.TisDateField" sortMissingLast="true" omitNorms="true"/>
 -->
    <fieldType name="test" class="plugin:test" sortMissingLast="true" omitNorms="true" />
    <fieldType name="date" class="solr.StrField" sortMissingLast="true" omitNorms="true" />
    <fieldType name="text_comma_split" class="solr.TextField" positionIncrementGap="100" autoGeneratePhraseQueries="false" omitNorms="true" omitTermFreqAndPositions="true">
      <analyzer>
        <tokenizer class="solr.PatternTokenizerFactory" pattern="[^,]+" group="0" />
      </analyzer>
    </fieldType>
    <fieldType name="phone_like" class="solr.TextField" sortMissingLast="true" omitNorms="true" autoGeneratePhraseQueries="false" omitTermFreqAndPositions="true">
      <analyzer type="index">
        <tokenizer class="solr.NGramTokenizerFactory" minGramSize="2" maxGramSize="20" />
        <filter class="solr.LowerCaseFilterFactory" />
      </analyzer>
      <analyzer type="query">
        <tokenizer class="solr.WhitespaceTokenizerFactory" />
        <filter class="solr.LowerCaseFilterFactory" />
      </analyzer>
    </fieldType>
  </types>
  <fields>
    <!--tab totalpay-->
    <field name="totalpay_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="true" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="curr_date" type="tint" stored="true" indexed="true" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="outfee" type="tfloat" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="source_amount" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="discount_amount" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="result_amount" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="recieve_amount" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="coupon_discount" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="ratio" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="status" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="entity_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <!--add 20190413 for mall query-->
    <field name="mall_id" type="test" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="is_valid" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="op_time" type="date" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="last_ver" type="long" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="op_user_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="discount_plan_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="operator" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="operate_date" type="tlong" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_entity_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="is_full_ratio" type="tint" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="is_minconsume_ratio" type="tint" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="is_servicefee_ratio" type="tint" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="invoice_code" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="invoice_memo" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="invoice" type="tfloat" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="over_status" type="tint" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="is_hide" type="tint" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="load_time" type="tlong" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="modify_time" type="tlong" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="special_fee_summary" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--tab orderinfo-->
    <field name="instance_count" type="int" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="false" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="people_count" type="int" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="order_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="area_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="seat_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="is_valido" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="inner_code" type="phone_like" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" default="-1" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="order_from" type="tint" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="order_kind" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="open_time" type="tlong" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="end_time" type="tlong" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="order_status" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="code" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="seat_code" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--add 20170718 from order table-->
    <field name="order_mobile" type="phone_like" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="order_address" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--2017-05-25-->
    <field name="customerregister_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--tab pay-->
    <field name="kindpay" type="dynamicFloat" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="all_pay_fee" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--servicebillinfo and orderbill-->
    <field name="service_bill_final_amount" type="float" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="bill_info_final_amount" type="float" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <!--tab instance-->
    <!--
<field name="all_ratio_fee"          type="tfloat"    stored="true"      indexed="true"    required="false"/>
  -->
    <field name="all_menu" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="all_fee" type="float" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="customer_ids" type="text_comma_split" stored="true" indexed="true" docValues="false" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--支付用户id-->
    <field name="pay_customer_ids" type="text_comma_split" stored="true" indexed="true" docValues="false" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--是否取餐-->
    <field name="has_fetch" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" docValues="false" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="menu_id" type="allmenu" stored="false" indexed="true" docValues="false" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="kindmenu_id" type="allkind" stored="false" indexed="true" docValues="false" required="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--card customer-->
    <field name="card_code" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_inner_code" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_customer_id" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_customer_name" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_customer_spell" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_customer_moble" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="card_customer_phone" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--全局会员ID-->
    <field name="global_customer_id" type="test" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--20170818 -->
    <!--外卖人员电话号码-->
    <field name="courier_phone" type="phone_like" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--20171012 -->
    <!--外部订单号-->
    <field name="out_id" type="phone_like" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--是否和企业卡相关-->
    <field name="is_enterprise_card" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <!--报销状态-->
    <field name="expense_status" type="int" stored="true" indexed="true" required="false" default="-1" docValues="false" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="expense_create_time" type="long" stored="true" indexed="false" docValues="true" required="false" default="0" multiValued="false" />
    <!--value from kindpay-->
    <dynamicField name="k_*" type="string" stored="true" indexed="true" multiValued="false" docValues="false" />
    <dynamicField name="m_*" type="string" stored="true" indexed="false" multiValued="false" docValues="false" />
    <field name="_version_" type="long" indexed="true" stored="true" docValues="true" multiValued="false" />
    <field name="text" type="string" indexed="true" stored="false" multiValued="true" docValues="false" />
  </fields>
  <copyField source="all_menu" dest="menu_id" />
  <copyField source="all_menu" dest="kindmenu_id" />
  <sharedKey>entity_id</sharedKey>
  <uniqueKey>totalpay_id</uniqueKey>
</schema>
